clab:head.clab:title: Legal/Financial/Professional Research | D&B For Your Customers

clab:content.p: Help your customers use D&B insight for research; provide depth of information suitable for investment decisions, due diligence, conflict of interest, and more.

clab:body.p: Your customers need access to comprehensive insight, insight they rely on to make critical business decisions. Whether your customers conduct legal, financial, or other professional practices, your research helps drive their business.
clab:body.h2: How D&B For Your Customers helps you
clab:body.p: Our solutions for legal, financial, and other professional research will help your customers effectively use the business data they need for decisioning. With easy integration into your systems and processes and unparalleled depth of information, your customers will rely on you for current, accurate business insight, just as thousands of companies rely on D&B data for due diligence, conflict of interest resolution, investment decisions, and more.
clab:body.h3: The extraordinary depth, breadth, and quality of our data sets us apart.

ul.li: The D&B Global Database is the largest single source of local and global business data in the world, with information on more than 140 million global businesses in more than 190 countries.

Our world-class DUNSRight® Quality Process—with more than 2,000 separate automated and manual checks, and data updated more than 1.5 million times daily—ensures insight that is accurate, complete, timely, consistent and, most importantly, actionable.
Hard-to-find private company data including detailed insight on the largest 250k U.S. companies, private company financial statements, and basic details on millions of private companies worldwide.

Public records include
149 million public records from 3,100 U.S. courts and state offices
60 million business registrations
24 million suits, liens, and judgment filings
64 million UCC filings
1.1 million bankruptcy filings
Detailed, hand-written editorial and in-depth coverage on 44,000 companies is provided by Hoover's, a D&B company.

clab:body.h3: Our database building and management capabilities are one-of-a-kind.

ul.li: Our patented Entity Matching technology and unique expertise enable you and your customers to effectively match and link similar data and maintain its quality over time.
Our globally recognized D-U-N-S® Number acts as a key for data, provides continuity and consistency, and eliminates records duplication.
Our powerful Corporate Linkage identifies how corporate families are linked to help your customers understand true total spend (and negotiate better deals as a result).

clab:body.h3: Our uniquely qualified consultative team has your back.

ul.li: Specialized D&B Relationship Managers have the expertise, insight, and flexibility to help you successfully integrate D&B data and solutions into your offerings.
Our one-touch dedicated “For Your Customers” customer hotline is at your service.
